name: supply-chain-e
author: pk <pkrasam@gmail.com> (https://ipfs.infura.io/ipfs/QmSXiR9Khm3yo1J67nUopvVBxFJ8YGN2fUGZ34Etr3m92x/)
description: The purpose of this project is to create a series of smart contracts that would be used in a supply chain for coffee. There is also a UI aspect of the project that allows members of the supplychain to update the state of the product as it goes along the supply chain.
